method.name: GetCookie
method.comment: Returns the cookie for the given Url in the format: NAME=VALUE [; NAME=VALUE] If no cookie exists for the Url then a null value will be returned.

method.name: RemoveSessionCookies
method.comment: Removes all session cookies stored for your application.

method.name: HasCookies
method.comment: Returns True if any cookies are stored for your application.

method.name: RemoveAllCookies
method.comment: Removes all cookies stored for your application.

method.name: SetCookie
method.comment: Sets the cookie for the Url to the Value.

method.name: SetAcceptCookies
method.comment: Set whether cookies will be accepted for your application.

method.name: RemoveExpiredCookies
method.comment: Removes all expired cookies stored for your application.

method.name: GetAcceptCookies
method.comment: Returns True if cookies will be accepted by your application.

root.comment: CookieManager is a simple wrapper for the Android <link>CookieManager|http://developer.android.com/reference/android/webkit/CookieManager.html</link> Class. It enables you to manages the cookies used by your application's WebView instances.
root.author: Martin Pearman
